scripts.check: npm --workspace frontend run check && npm --workspace backend run check
scripts.clean:all: rimraf frontend/dist backend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules frontend/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json package-lock.json
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm --workspace backend start" "npm --workspace frontend run dev"
scripts.start:staging: concurrently "npm --workspace backend run staging" "npm --workspace frontend run dev -- --mode staging"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm --workspace backend run prod" "npm --workspace frontend run dev -- --mode production"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
